name: The Red Den
description:
First game jam game! Wasted so much time on graphics that I had to delete half of the assets for performance reasons. I actually missed the deadline by a few minutes, but I'll put it up just for fun. It's very rough around the edges, but the concept is there.

The win and death states are extremely bugged. Both freeze the game and distort the UI, but it should tell you if you've won.

Made for the Happy New Year Jam 2022. The theme was "Rise and Fall"
